name: UICollectionView.ReorderingCadence
desc: Constants indicating the speed at which collection view items are reorganized during a drop.

items.name: case immediate
items.desc: Items are reordered into place immediately.

items.name: case fast
items.desc: Items are reordered quickly, but with a short delay.

items.name: case slow
items.desc: Items are reordered after a delay.
